sqlMap.select:
select count(*)/30 from TB_SCHEDULE_INFO
date_issue=#date_issue#
inOutType=#inOutType#

select top 100* from TB_SCHEDULE_INFO where table_id not in( select top
$ntop$
30
table_id from TB_SCHEDULE_INFO
date_issue=#date_issue#
inOutType=#inOutType#
order by table_id )
date_issue=#date_issue#
inOutType=#inOutType#
select company_abbr from TB_SCHEDULE_INFO where date_issue=#date_issue# group by company_abbr
where inOutType=#inOutType# order by port, fromPort

select TB_TABLE_INFO.table_id, TB_TABLE_INFO.out_to_port, TB_TABLE_INFO.out_port, TB_TABLE_INFO.in_to_port, TB_TABLE_INFO.in_port, TB_ADV_INFO.data from TB_TABLE_INFO,TB_ADV_INFO where TB_TABLE_INFO.table_id=TB_ADV_INFO.table_id
sqlMap.insert:
insert TB_SCHEDULE_INFO( table_id, vessel, voyage_num, port, dateF, dateT, company_abbr, agent, TS, common_shipping, area_code, inOutType, fromPort, date_issue, gubun, ts_vessel, ts_date, n_voyage_num, area_name
console_cfs
console_page
c_time
d_time
inland_port
inland_date
) values( #table_id#, #vessel#, #voyage_num#, #port#, #dateF#, #dateT#, #company_abbr#, #agent#,
'' ,
#TS#,
#common_shipping#,
#area_code#,
0,
#inOutType#, #fromPort#, #date_issue#, #gubun#
#ts_vessel#
''
#ts_date#
''
0
#n_voyage_num#
#area_name#
''
#console_cfs#
#console_page#
#c_time#
#d_time#
#inland_port#
#inland_date#
)

insert TB_INLAND_SCHEDULE_INFO( table_id, vessel, voyage_num, port, dateF, dateT, company_abbr, agent, TS, common_shipping, area_code, inOutType, fromPort, date_issue, gubun, ts_vessel, ts_date, n_voyage_num, area_name
console_cfs
console_page
c_time
d_time
inland_port
inland_date
) values( #table_id#, #vessel#, #voyage_num#, #port#, #dateF#, #dateT#, #company_abbr#, #agent#,
'' ,
#TS#,
#common_shipping#,
#area_code#,
0,
#inOutType#, #fromPort#, #date_issue#, #gubun#
#ts_vessel#
''
#ts_date#
''
0
#n_voyage_num#
#area_name#
''
#console_cfs#
#console_page#
#c_time#
#d_time#
#inland_port#
#inland_date#
)
sqlMap.select:
select fromPort from TB_SCHEDULE_INFO where inOutType='O'
port=#port#
group by fromPort

select port from TB_SCHEDULE_INFO where inOutType='I'
fromPort=#fromPort#
group by port

select fromPort from TB_SCHEDULE_INFO where inOutType='O'
port=#port#
and TS!='TS' group by fromPort

select fromPort from TB_SCHEDULE_INFO where inOutType='O'
port=#port#
and TS='TS' group by fromPort

select port from TB_SCHEDULE_INFO where inOutType='O' and gubun='Normal'
fromPort=#fromPort#
group by port order by port

select *, vessel_name from TB_SCHEDULE_INFO,TB_VESSEL where inOutType='O' and TB_VESSEL.vessel_name=TB_SCHEDULE_INFO.vessel
port=#port#
order by dateF

select * from TB_SCHEDULE_INFO where inOutType='O'
fromPort=#fromPort#
port=#port#
order by dateF

select * from TB_SCHEDULE_INFO where inOutType='O'
fromPort=#fromPort#
port=#port#
order by dateF

select * from TB_SCHEDULE_INFO where inOutType='O' and gubun='console'
date_issue=#date_issue#
order by port, fromPort, DateF,DateT

select * from TB_INLAND_SCHEDULE_INFO where gubun='inland'
table_id=#table_id#
company_abbr=#company_abbr#
agent=#agent#
inOutType=#inOutType#
vessel=#vessel#
voyage_num=#voyage_num#
fromPort=#fromPort#
port=#port#
inland_port=#inland_port#
date_issue=#date_issue#
order by port, fromPort, DateF,DateT

select fromPort from TB_SCHEDULE_INFO where inOutType='I'
fromPort=#fromPort#
port=#port#
group by fromPort order by fromPort

select port from TB_SCHEDULE_INFO where inOutType='I'
fromPort=#fromPort#
port=#port#
group by port

select * from TB_SCHEDULE_INFO, TB_VESSEL_H where inOutType='I' and TB_SCHEDULE_INFO.vessel=TB_VESSEL_H.vessel_name
fromPort=#fromPort#
port=#port#
order by vessel, DateT,DateF

select * from TB_SCHEDULE_INFO where inOutType='I'
fromPort=#fromPort#
port=#port#
order by vessel, DateT,DateF
select port_name from TB_PORT_ABBR where port_abbr=#port_abbr#
select * from TB_PORT where port_name=#port_name#

select * from TB_SCHEDULE_INFO where inOutType='I'
fromPort=#fromPort#
vessel=#vessel#
order by dateT
sqlMap.sql:
select * from TB_SCHEDULE_INFO where inOutType=#inOutType#
area_code=#area_code#
vessel=#vessel#
voyage_num=#voyage_num#
port=#port#
sqlMap.select: select vessel, voyage_num, port, DateF,DateT,company_abbr,fromPort,InOutType,date_issue,table_id,agent,port_nationality,aPort from (select vessel, voyage_num, port, DateF,DateT,company_abbr,fromPort,InOutType,date_issue,table_id,agent,port_nationality,TB_PORT.port_area as aPort from TB_SCHEDULE_INFO, TB_PORT where TB_PORT.port_name=TB_SCHEDULE_INFO.port) as tb where aPort=#area_name# and inOutType=#inOutType# order by vessel

select vessel,n_voyage_num from (select vessel, voyage_num, port, DateF,DateT,company_abbr,fromPort,InOutType,date_issue,table_id,agent,n_voyage_num,port_nationality,TB_PORT.port_area as aPort from TB_SCHEDULE_INFO, TB_PORT where TB_PORT.port_name=TB_SCHEDULE_INFO.port) as tb where aPort=#area_name# and inOutType=#inOutType# group by vessel,n_voyage_num order by vessel
select voyage_num, vessel,company_abbr from TB_SCHEDULE_INFO where area_code=#area_code# and inOutType=#inOutType# group by voyage_num,vessel,company_abbr order by vessel
select * from TB_SCHEDULE_INFO where inOutType=#inOutType# and vessel=#vessel# and voyage_num =#voyage_num# order by dateT
select * from TB_SCHEDULE_INFO where inOutType=#inOutType# and port=#port# and fromPort=#fromPort# order by port, fromPort
select date_issue, gubun from TB_SCHEDULE_INFO group by date_issue,gubun
select date_issue, gubun from TB_INLAND_SCHEDULE_INFO group by date_issue,gubun
select count(*) from TB_SCHEDULE_INFO

select area_name from TB_SCHEDULE_INFO where inOutType='O'
group by area_name order by area_name
